Member Function Documentation

void BtTransport::Enable (   )  [virtual]
 

Request enabling of the transport (asynchronously).

This method attempts to enable the transport, posibly involving conflict management intervention or MMI activity. Therefore, every implementation is expected to deliver the result asynchronously by calling OnAvStateChanged().

Implements AbstractTransport.

AbstractTransport::AvState BtTransport::GetAvState (   )  const [virtual]
 

Query remote device name.

Implements AbstractTransport.

BtTransport & BtTransport::GetInstance (   )  [static]
 

Get singleton instance.

BtGapAndSdapController is implemented as a singleton, so GetInstance() returns a refernce to the singleton object of BtGapAndSdapController.

Returns:
Reference to a BtGapAndSdapController containing the singleton instance object.
